tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE appointments (
	appointment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
	patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
	healthcare_provider_id UUID NOT NULL,
	appointment_date DATE NOT NULL,
	appointment_time TIME NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  date_of_birth DATE,
  gender ENUM('Male', 'Female', 'Other'),
  insurance_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_providers (
  provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR(255),
  specialty VARCHAR(100),
  location_address VARCHAR(255),
  contact_number VARCHAR(15)
);

CREATE TABLE patients (
    patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_name VARCHAR(50),
    patient_phone VARCHAR(15),
    patient_email VARCHAR(50)
)

CREATE TABLE patients (
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  appointment_date DATE,
  appointment_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE healthcare_providers (
  provider_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  provider_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  specialty VARCHAR(50),
  location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
  appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  provider_id INT,
  appointment_date DATE,
  appointment_time TIME,
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_providers(provider_id)
);

CREATE TABLE medical_history (
  patient_id INT,
  medical_condition VARCHAR(100),
  diagnosis_date DATE,
  PRIMARY KEY (patient_id, medical_condition),
  FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    provider_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME,
    appointment_notes TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_providers(provider_id)
);

CREATE TABLE schedules (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    provider_id INT,
    schedule_date DATE,
    schedule_start_time TIME,
    schedule_end_time TIME,
    AVAILABLE_SLOTS INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_providers(provider_id)
);

CREATE TABLE appointments_history (
    appointment_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    patient_id INT,
    provider_id INT,
    appointment_date DATE,
    appointment_time TIME,
    appointment_notes TEXT,
    appointment_status VARCHAR(20),
    FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (provider_id) REFERENCES healthcare_providers(provider_id)
);
